A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like:
Killing off what made the franchise great while ironically killing off all the cast memebers that made the movies great; Kathleen Kennedy needs to stay in her lane and quit ruining on of the great pillars of sci-fi.

The injection of SJW cancer into sci-fi (which is overwhelmingly supported by MEN) is having a similar effect when Marvel tried to feminize its comic books- people stop buying them.

Your franchise is turning to ash while you play you fritter away your remaining fans with virtue signals and purple haired douche-ex-machinas.
